mapper.sql:
from woc.`case` t left join woc.traffic tc on t.trafficId = tc.id left join woc.person p on t.party = p.id left join portal.department d on p.companyId = d.department_id where 1 = 1
and t.caseNo like concat(#{condition.caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
